body_html: I'm closing this issue due to inactivity. It's likely that the OP is on CentOS 7 and the bug is due to https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1305406. A workaround might be to use tcmalloc, but we don't know yet. It's actively being discussed in #4960.
